column6: STARSTALKER Part 1 of 2! How has the aftermath of the War of Kings affected the newly reborn and viciously battered Nova Corps? Out of the devastation-and from Marvel's cosmic past-strides a mysterious new threat...and an unexpected ally!
column8: | writer:Dan Abnett | writer:Andy Lanning | colorist:Impacto - Bruno Hang | colorist:Brandon Peterson | inker:Nelson Pereira | letterer:Cory Petit | penciller:Kevin Sharpe
